name: Music_1968.wav
caption: This bollywood song features a harmonica playing the main melody. The harmonica is played with a tremolo effect at the end of the lines. This is accompanied by a percussion playing a simple beat, A violin repeats the last part of the melody as played by the harmonica. The bass plays the root note of the chords. This is an amateur recording and the rest of the instruments are not clearly audible. This song can be played in a happy movie.
